name: Endless Minesweeper
description:
Simple prototype of an algorithm that generates the board endlessly as you keep playing

There shouldn't be any situation where you'd have to guess, but if you find one, feel free to send me a screenshot: Melo#8511

Left Mouse Button - reveals the tile
Right Mouse Button - flags the tile
Middle Mouse Button - moves the board
R - restart game
B - return to the starting position
F11 - fullscreen
